thread.title: Bradley Cooper Reacts to His 'Engagement' to Amy Schumer (Video)
thread.title_full: Bradley Cooper Reacts to His 'Engagement' to Amy Schumer (Video) - newsR

author: newsr.in
title: Bradley Cooper Reacts to His 'Engagement' to Amy Schumer (Video)
text: Bradley Cooper and Sienna Miller participate in a Q&A at a screening of their film Burnt held at the iPic Westwood on Tuesday (October 13) in Westwood, Calif. This weekend, Amy Schumer joked during her SNL opening monologue that she and the 40-year-old actor were engaged. Access Hollywood sat down with Bradley and congratulated him [...] Â»
